channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Richard Jackson's Garden
channel.desc: Richard Jackson's Garden is here to inspire, advise and create an irreversible bond between you and your garden, no matter your experience. Join us on our new and exciting outdoor adventure.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Plants2Gardens
channel.desc: Specialising in mature plants for instant impact, Plants2Gardens offer a huge array of vibrant, colourful blooms to help transform your outdoor space and bring your garden to life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.desc: Find your new beauty favourites with Sigma's unrivalled selection. You'll find a fabulous range of makeup, brushes and cleaning items so you can create that perfect base every single day.
